selectStatements.query:
SELECT
COALESCE(PAYABLES_ORG.ORGANIZATION_ID,-99999) PAYABLES_ORG_ID,
COALESCE(RECEIVABLES_ORG.ORGANIZATION_ID,-99999) RECEIVABLES_ORG_ID,
FISCAL_DAY.FISCAL_PERIOD_SET_NAME FISCAL_CALENDAR,
FISCAL_DAY.FISCAL_PERIOD_TYPE FISCAL_PERIOD_TYPE,
FISCAL_DAY.FISCAL_DAY_DATE FISCAL_DAY_DATE,
FISCAL_DAY.FISCAL_DAY_OF_YEAR FISCAL_DAY_OF_YEAR,
FISCAL_DAY.ADJUSTMENT_PERIOD_FLAG ADJUSTMENT_PERIOD_FLAG,
COALESCE(LEDGER.LEDGER_ID,-99999) LEDGER_ID
FROM
DW_FISCAL_DAY_D FISCAL_DAY
INNER JOIN DW_FISCAL_CONTEXT_G FISCAL_CONTEXT ON FISCAL_DAY.FISCAL_PERIOD_SET_NAME = FISCAL_CONTEXT.FISCAL_PERIOD_SET_NAME
AND FISCAL_DAY.FISCAL_PERIOD_TYPE = FISCAL_CONTEXT.FISCAL_PERIOD_TYPE
LEFT OUTER JOIN DW_INTERNAL_ORG_D PAYABLES_ORG ON FISCAL_CONTEXT.ORGANIZATION_ID = TO_CHAR(PAYABLES_ORG.ORGANIZATION_ID) AND PAYABLES_ORG.PAYABLES_INVOICING_BU_FLAG = 'Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN DW_INTERNAL_ORG_D RECEIVABLES_ORG ON FISCAL_CONTEXT.ORGANIZATION_ID = TO_CHAR(RECEIVABLES_ORG.ORGANIZATION_ID) AND RECEIVABLES_ORG.BILLING_REVENUE_MNG_BU_FLAG = 'Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN DW_INTERNAL_ORG_D LEDGER_ORG ON FISCAL_CONTEXT.ORGANIZATION_ID = TO_CHAR(LEDGER_ORG.ORGANIZATION_ID)  
LEFT OUTER JOIN DW_LEDGER_D LEDGER ON LEDGER_ORG.PRIMARY_LEDGER = LEDGER.LEDGER_NAME
WHERE FISCAL_DAY.ADJUSTMENT_PERIOD_FLAG = 'N'
